availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David C. Thurman (Lewis County, Kentucky, farmer and sgt. ;ieut 22nd KY Inf USA)

body.p: Lewis County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Ohio native. Married to Catharine M. Murphy Thurman in Lewis County, Kentucky, on February 8, 1860. Farmer in Lewis County, Kentucky, in 1860. Served in the 22nd Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as first sergeant and first lieutenant from January 10, 1862, to August 3, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, p. 888.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lewis County Marriages, Film #000344052, p. 227.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0352.
